In Doctor Morrison's breakfast-room the curtains were drawn back, and the windows stood wide open, letting in a flood of warm June sunshine, and filling the whole room with the fragrance of the soft June air.
Clark, Ellery H. (Ellery Harding), 1874-1949; Brehm, George, 1878-1966 [Illustrator]
